remarks.format: ## Remarks 在许多 Active Directory 域服务配置操作（如管理扩展权限）中使用。The is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [schemaIDGUID](https://docs.microsoft.com/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-tail/5038cdbe-b665-429c-a36e-36a45f576b81) 或 [架构 ID-GUID](/windows/desktop/adschema/a-schemaidguid)。For more information, see [schemaIDGUID](https://docs.microsoft.com/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-tail/5038cdbe-b665-429c-a36e-36a45f576b81) or [Schema-ID-GUID](/windows/desktop/adschema/a-schemaidguid).

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: 目标服务器忙或不可用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
